snippet: Gov. Chris Christie took President Obama on a tour of the storm damage, but Mayor Lorenzo Langford of Atlantic City, with whom he has been feuding, did not get to come along.
abstract: Gov Chris Christie escorts Pres Obama on a tour of Hurricane Sandy's damage to ravaged New Jersey Shore region, but Mayor Lorenzo Langford of Atlantic City, with whom Christie has been feuding, is not invited along.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie took President Obama on a tour of the storm damage, but Mayor Lorenzo Langford of Atlantic City, with whom he has been feuding, did not get to come along.

headline.seo: Atlantic City Mayor Is Left Off Obama and Christie Storm Tour
headline.main: One Storm Still Hasn’t Blown Over
headline.print_headline: One Storm Still Hasn’t Blown Over
